content.question: public static int what(String str, String check) { int num = -1; int len = check.length(); for (int k = 0; k + len <= str.length(); k++) { String a = str.substring(k, k + len); if (a.equals(check)) { num = k; } } return num; } Assume that check occurs at least once in str. Which of the following best describes the value returned by the what method?

choices.label: The number of times the string check occurs in str
The index of the first occurrence of check inside str
The index of the last occurrence of check inside str
The number of substrings in str with the same length as check

content.answer: The index of the last occurrence of check inside str

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
